collection.name: Way Go Home
collection.openText: Let's walk together. To a wonderful land… The world of dreams.

observe.desc:
[ {‘Gather around, everyone. Dance with me!’ A scarecrow with hay for brains, an emotionless woosman of tin, and a lion without courage all soon gathered around her.
‘Friends! Let us proceed! Let's all go home together!’ Together, on their way home, they all obtained what they wished for
‘Let's all go together. A road long and harsh.’ And so, their endless march began.
Let's all march onward. To a beautiful land, to a world of dreams.} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: "When an employee with Fortitude Level 4 or higher began work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When Instinct work was done, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When an employee enters the unit while the Qliphoth Counter is at 0, they will immediately die. Then, the Abnormality will escape.
When $0 breached, a 'Home' fell somewhere within the Facility.
$0 called upon F-05-32 and F-01-87 within the Facility, and started a march.
The parade homeward continues forever. Unable to ever go back home, they embark on an endless journey.

etc.param: My endless journey started with a furious cyclone.
